title: Game Progress Route

The prospect of rewards appeals â€“ I'm in. The Stone Lord seems a better choice. I'd rather abstain from this. I might just eliminate you both and claim the spoils. Can't we find common ground? Must conflict be the only recourse?

Opt for the first
